snippet.title: 002 PEN PEN TRIICELON - An empty kart racer | DREAMVERSE
snippet.description:
This is a video about a couple of things, but mostly Pen Pen TriIcelon for the Dreamcast.

Being one of the first third-party developed games for the Dreamcast, it's obvious that much of the development time went to just understanding the hardware. And that is evident in the lack of actual gameplay content. 

'Dreamverse' is about a chronologically talking, in a semi-deep voice, about every European and North American released game for SEGAs last console.

Music by Lin Vale, 
a track called "Another Day in the Office"
https://soundcloud.com/linvaleofficial/another-day-in-the-office

Apologies for sometimes butchering the japanese language (and other languages).
